gataddhino.summary: (adj) who has walked the path; who has completed the journey [gata + addha + ī], [gataddha + ī] adj, comp, from gataddha

na.summary: (ind) (adds a question mark) surely?; does one not? ind, interr
(cs) (gram) nā; conjugational sign of group 5 kiyādigaṇa verbs cs, masc

(masc) (gram) indicatory letter ṇ; sign indicating that vuddhi takes place masc, prefix
(cs) (gram) ṇā; conjugational sign of group 4 svādigaṇa verbs cs, masc

pariḷāho.summary: (masc) affliction (of); discomfort (of); distress (in) [pari + √ḍah > ḷah > ḷāh + *a] masc, from pariḍahati

sabbaganthappahīnassa.summary: (adj) eliminated all ties; abandoned all bonds [sabbagantha + pahīna] adj, comp

vijjati.summary: (pr) exists (in); is found (in); is present (in) [vijja + ti] pr, pass of vindati
(pr) is possible; is plausible [vijja + ti] pr, pass of vindati

vippamuttassa.summary: (pp) freed (from); released (from); saved (from) [vi + pa + √muc + ta] pp of vipamuccati

visokassa.summary: (adj) without grief; sorrow-free [vi + soka] adj, comp, from soka
